About.title: What is OpenCodeX?
About.subtitle: OpenCodeX is a collaboration platform that connects developers with open source or non-profit projects. Here you can contribute your skills, learn as part of a team, and contribute to real ideas that impact others.
About.ideaDesc: The idea for OpenCodeX was born when we saw how many developers (especially students and self-taught programmers) wanted to collaborate on real projects but couldn't find a place to do so. We created this space so that anyone can find interesting projects or start their own, with a focus on learning and teamwork.

ourValuesDesc.1: We believe in the power of teamwork and growing together.
ourValuesDesc.2: All projects here are open and accessible for contribution.
ourValuesDesc.3: We encourage continuous learning through real-world practice.

About.ourTeamDesc: We are a small group of developers and designers passionate about open source and collaboration. We are building OpenCodeX as a free and accessible space for everyone.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: At OpenCodeX, we value your privacy. This platform was built to be a safe space for collaboration. Here's how we handle your data:

list.1: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent.
list.2: The information you share (such as your skills or profile) will only be visible within the platform.
list.3: We use secure authentication and encryption tools to protect your account.
list.4: You can request to delete your account at any time and all your data will be deleted.
list.5: We do not send mass emails or sell user lists.
